title: Determine if score is within ten points of target

content.description: A programmer wants to determine whether a score is within 10 points of a given target. For example, if the target is 50, then the scores 40, 44, 50, 58, and 60 are all within 10 points of the target, while 38 and 61 are not.
content.question: Which of the following Boolean expressions will evaluate to true if and only if score is within 10 points of target ?

skill.text: Skill 2.B: Implement and apply an algorithm.
